author: pdp
content: Md, Kishor, thanks for the suggestions. Although I cannot see why this colour scheme is so bad, I am willing to do the necessary changes to make the website more accessible. Do you have any suggestions? Please, post them to the GNUCITIZEN Feedback Topic. Thanks.

author: Hercules
content:
The website color scheme is perfectly allright. It puts less strain on eyes as compared to the scheme with white/ more luminous background. 
Think like a hacker !
Cheers
